alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 03 at 8:02PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Mississippi and southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis, Lawrence and Marion. In southeast Mississippi, Covington, Forrest, Jones and Lamar. * WHEN...Until 2 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rainfall amounts of two to four inches are expected in a short period of time, with isolated higher amounts possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
